name: PinInput
description: A multi-digit input component for verification codes with auto-advance, paste support, and masking

accessibility.screenReader: Each field announces position in group. Complete code announced when filled. Supports one-time-code autocomplete.

recommendedUsage: Use for OTP/verification codes. Enable mask for sensitive PINs. Use alphanumeric for mixed codes.
antiPatterns: Do not use for passwords - use Input with type=password. Avoid for long codes - consider different UX.
